Get an Election

Get a specific Election.

HTTP Request 

GET /v1/elections/{id}

Examples

Get a specific Election:
https://api.ballotapi.org/v1/elections/a12345
Include Contests in the Election:
https://api.ballotapi.org/v1/elections/a12345?include=contests

Query Parameters

Parameter Format Description Example
include String A comma separated list of resources to include for each Election object response. Options are: "contests" and "precincts" include=contests

Response

We will return an Election object for the specified id.

Example response: 

{
    "type": "election",
    "id": "123-4",
    "ocd_id": null,
    "election_type": "general",
    "election_name": "Midterm Election",
    "date": "2018-11-05",
    "short_info": "This is a major national election that..."
}

HTTP Response Codes

Code Response Format Description
200 Response Successful request.
400 Error Response The query parameters you included were invalid. The Error Response will include a message describing exactly was invalid.
404 Error Response We could not find an Election with that id.
429 N/A You are making too many requests to the API. Check the Retry-After header for how many seconds to wait until trying the request again. See our docs on Rate Limiting.
500 N/A An internal server error occurred. We log these errors and try to fix them quickly, so if you keep getting 500 errors for a few days, please email us.
503 N/A We are down for maintenance. Please try your request again in a few minutes.
504 N/A Your request timed out. Please try your request again in a few minutes.
